txt.en: 'The Captain of the Guard, Unnarr, has been looking for you for an hour, at least. And, what's worse for you, he's already angry due to a guard having abandoned his post.\n\n'You may find Unnarr in Frerin's Court. If I were you, I would tread carefully around him.'
'Good, you received my summons. At least someone knows their duty.\n\n'Come now, we must speak of circumstances most dire and worrisome.'
'Unnarr will have my beard if you're late. Get a move on... you don't want to keep him waiting.'
Prologue: At the Behest of Unnarr
You were greeted by the Dwarf Skógi as you arrived at Thorin's Hall.
Unnarr is waiting for you in Frerin's Court.\n\nSkógi told you to speak to Unnarr, the Captain of the Guard.
